original_title: ‘Oceanista Residencies, Odiliya’s latest addition to comfort’
original_body_lines: Odiliya Residencies (Pvt) Ltd, a trusted and renowned name in offering luxury living spaces and residence, is set to unveil its latest venture by the famed beach in Panadura. The intended luxury apartment complex, Oceanista Residencies, surrounded from one side, the scenic beach and the Bolgoda River from the other end, will offer its residence the mixture of luxury, comfort, scenic surroundings and the opportunity to get closer to the varieties nature has to offer.

The 9-storied Oceanista Residencies will include 24 luxury apartments, promising unique meaning to privacy and comfort living in a secured environment. Moreover, all 24 apartments will face the ocean over the Panadura Beach, adding uniqueness like never before. With the Bolgoda River facing the other end, Oceanista Residencies pledges the daily viewing flair from sunrise to sunset, a mind-blowing experience that surely adds serenity to a peaceful life.

The Oceanista Residencies, set to stand tall on the Panadura Beach through the visionary contributions of a well-experienced panel of Engineers and state-of-the-art Architectural designs, is situated on the Panadura Beach, a location famous and often frequented by local and foreign tourists, just 50 meters away from the banks of Bolgoda River. The Galenigama Exchange of the Southern Expressway lies few miles away from the location, which has easy access to Supermarkets, Restaurants, Hospitals and daily necessities within close proximity.
